product_name: Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shrug - Women's
long_description: When you know you'll want to wear a tank top to stay cool later in the day but need morning warmth, start your ride wearing the women's Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shrug. Fabric excels at moisture wicking, so you stay dry and comfortable. Zippered front and high neck keep your upper body protected. UPF 50+ sun protection blocks harmful UV rays. Fabric features Icefil(R) technology that makes you feel cooler by a few degrees on hot days when you wear the shrug for sun protection. Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shrug for women features reflective elements and a screenprinted design on lower sleeve.
short_description: When you know you'll want to wear a tank top to stay cool later in the day but need morning warmth, start your ride wearing the women's Pearl Izumi Symphony Bike Shrug.
